inventory.name: Khan's Shortbow
inventory.description: A finely crafted shortbow, engraved with runes of an ancient archer lord, granting enhanced precision and power.

inventory.name: Dagger
inventory.description: A small, sharp blade, ideal for quick strikes or throwing.

inventory.name: Moonlight Katana
inventory.description: A sleek, magical blade that gleams faintly under moonlight, imbued with enchantments for swift and deadly strikes.

inventory.name: Shortsword
inventory.description: A lightweight, versatile blade, perfect for quick slashes and thrusts.

spells.name: Sonic Disintegration
spells.description: You unleash a blast of sonic energy that tears through a target, potentially shattering stone structures.

spells.name: Fortune's Favor
spells.description: You grant a creature a spark of luck, allowing them to excel in their next endeavor.

spells.name: Curse of Misfortune
spells.description: You curse a creature with ill luck, hindering their actions.

spells.name: Dancing Lights
spells.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights that hover and move at your command, illuminating an area.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube is outlined in light, granting advantage on attack rolls against affected creatures.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.description: You create a sound or image of an object that lasts for up to a minute, deceiving observers.

spells.name: Stealthy Concealment
spells.description: You weave shadows around yourself, making it harder for enemies to land a hit.

spells.name: Sneak Attack
spells.description: You exploit a foe’s distraction to deal extra damage with a precise strike.

spells.name: Expertise
spells.description: You tap into your honed skills, gaining an edge in specific tasks.

spells.name: Cunning Action
spells.description: Your agility allows you to take a bonus action to dash, disengage, or hide.
